report_name.title: Output Name
report_name.description: Name of output table of the report eg. historical_report

api_version.title: API version
api_version.description: Google Ad Manager API version. More info in Google docs

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: List of dimensions to use for the report, find supported dimensions for specific report types in the documentation

dimension_attributes.title: Dimension Attributes
dimension_attributes.description: List of dimensions attributes to use for the report, find supported dimension attributes for specific report types in the documentation

metrics.title: Metrics
metrics.description: List of metrics to use for the report, find supported metrics for specific report types in the documentation

ad_unit_view.title: Ad unit view
ad_unit_view.description: Ad unit view describes how data is fetched about ad units, data can be fetched for all ad units with Flat, only top level ad units with Top level, or Hierarchically

report_currency.title: Report Currency
report_currency.description: The currency for revenue metrics. Defaults to the network currency if left null. The supported currency codes can be found in .this Help Center article

include_zero_impressions.title: Include zero impressions
include_zero_impressions.description: If your report supports this, you can download data of ads with zero impressions

date_from.title: Date from
date_from.description: Start date of the report eg. 3 days ago

date_to.title: Date to
date_to.description: End date of the report eg. 1 day ago
